content:
I'm happy to help you plan your trip to New York City and catch a Yankees game!

However, I need to clarify a few things. As a conversational AI, I don't have real-time access to specific schedules or events. But I can suggest some ways for you to find the Yankees' schedule for the rest of the season.

1. Check the official New York Yankees website: You can visit the Yankees' official website ([www.mlb.com/yankees](http://www.mlb.com/yankees)) and click on the "Schedule" tab to view their upcoming games.
2. Use a sports website or app: Websites like ESPN, MLB.com, or sports apps like the MLB At Bat app often have up-to-date schedules for all MLB teams, including the Yankees.
3. Contact the Yankees ticket office: You can reach out to the Yankees ticket office directly to inquire about their schedule and availability of tickets.

Regarding your comment about watching the Yankees game with your buddy Mike, I'm happy to chat with you about it! However, I'm curious - which Lakers game were you referring to? The Yankees are a baseball team, and the Lakers are a basketball team that plays in Los Angeles. Did you mean to say you watched a different game or event?
